item.title: Bukovka - Map Locations / Coordinates.
item.author: invalid@example.com (iMkp - Matthew)
item.dc:creator: iMkp - Matthew
item.content:encoded:
Hopefully, this will help you, and or any other players of Decimation, yes, I may be missing some.
Feel free to msg me via discord of any that I missed.

Important;

Spawn | X: 144 Z: -530
Safezone Bridge | X: -910 Z: 2030

Live map; http://www.mcdecimation.net/livemaps.html

Military;...​

Bukovka - Map Locations / Coordinates.

item.title: Official Decimation Rules
item.author: invalid@example.com (ScottehBoeh)
item.dc:creator: ScottehBoeh
item.content:encoded:
In-Game Rules:

1. Do not Hack! (Vision Hacks & Movement Hacks) : 14 Days Ban
2. No Mic Spamming is Allowed!: 1 Warning > 1 Hour Ban > 1 Day Ban
3. Don't Spam in Chat!: 1 Warning > 1 Hour Ban > 1 Day Ban
4. Do not use Major Offensive Language (Including Racism) : Warning > 6 Hours Mute > 1 Hour Ban
5. CombatLogging is not allowed! : 1 Day Ban > 3 Days Ban
6. Don't spam guns in spawn! : 1 Warning > 1 Hour Ban + Impound of Gun > 6 Hour Ban
7. Abusing glitches is not...

Official Decimation Rules
